attributes.action: Ban the use of wire-rope barriers on dual carageways and motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a motorcyclist to have an accident near this type of barrier would cause death or loss of limbs. They don`t call them cheese cutters for no reason.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
